member.name: M:Seq.Client.NLog.LogEventInfoFormatter.GetValueAsLiteral(System.Object)
member.summary: GetValueAsLiteral attempts to transform the (string) object into a literal type prior to json serialization.
member.returns: A translated representation of the literal object type instead of a string.

member.name: T:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqPropertyItem
member.summary: Configures a property that enriches events sent to Seq.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqPropertyItem.As
member.summary: Either "string", which is the default, or "number", which will cause values of this type to be converted to numbers for storage.

member.name: T:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqTarget
member.summary: Writes events over HTTP to a Seq server.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqTarget.ServerUrl
member.summary: The address of the Seq server to write to.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqTarget.ApiKey
member.summary: A Seq API key that authenticates the client to the Seq server.

member.name: P:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqTarget.Properties
member.summary: A list of properties that will be attached to the events.

member.name: M:Seq.Client.NLog.SeqTarget.Write(NLog.Common.AsyncLogEventInfo[])
member.summary: Writes an array of logging events to Seq.
